channel.title: [pi] abyssal vine whip rep ++
channel.description:
i wanna copy the special attack off the normal whip and add it onto this whip and then once i have added the special attack onto it how do i change the gfx off the special attack to make it a custom special attack [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture218.png[/img]
[img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture219.png[/img]
so how do i add a special attack on ? then how would i change the gfx off the special attack to make it a custom one rep ++

item.title: [pi] abyssal vine whip rep ++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“dun dun dun, post:2, topic:422271”][php] case #####: // Vine Whip ID Here.
if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {
Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(###); //Change to your GFX id here.
}
c.specAccuracy = 1.10;
c.startAnimation(1658); // Weapon Animation
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
break;[/php]

Hope it helps any[/quote]
kk thanks

Read full topic

}

c.startAnimation(1658); // Weapon Animation
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
break;[/php]
